attributes.action: Go to school less. 3 days a week
attributes.background: Tell the schools that it can ruin people wellbeing going to school to much

rejection.details:
It's not clear if you want all schools to be required to operate a 3-day week, or if you just want schools to be open for fewer days.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Require schools to operate a 4 day week: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570949

If you want all schools to be required to operate 3-day weeks, you could start a new petition clearly requesting this.
